name: RTONS
description:
Recommend playing the Window version for better framerate

You played as the commander of the Blue Mainframe and your goal is to destroy the Red Mainframe. Build your army, capture more area, and then destroy the enemies!

RTONS is a prototype from my university class.

In this prototype, you can create units, move around, and attack enemies. The goal here is to destroy enemy's mainframe at the opposite side of your base.

Control

  • Left click or Left Hold: Select unit/building
  • Right Click: Give command to unit
  • WASD,QE: Change camera position
